column5: Notified today no houseboats out for the opener, Bummed

Well, that bites big time. Does that mean that your trip is canceled, or are they putting you in a lodge somewhere? Good luck, it is looking shaky for the rest of us to, but I have faith that things will break. We are heading to Cedar, we will go even if we miss a couple days.
Sorry to hear that. Maybe things will change. Booked with them for years and years until recently.
Maybe you can fish right of the houseboat in Hudson, got a feeling lost lake would open up by then.good luck.

No worries ProV. It has been a few years since we booked with them. We have been going to Abrams Lake park and staying in an RV and trailering to deception daily. We had a lot of fun years on the houseboat trip.
